rows: Check for dependency conflicts that might appear after you transfer elements between packages. Since version 8.2.2, Creatio alerts users that action could potentially degrade environment performance. Out of the box, those messages are enabled only for environments whoseEnvironment type(EnvironmentTypecode) system setting is set to "Production."

UI element

Action

Configuration action group

Validate configuration

Check for dependency conflicts that might appear after you transfer elements between packages. Since version 8.2.2, Creatio alerts users that action could potentially degrade environment performance. Out of the box, those messages are enabled only for environments whose Environment type (EnvironmentType code) system setting is set to "Production."
